messages.content: You are a professional AI basketball shooting coach.
Give me one piece of expert advice on shooting technique.

preferred_output.content: Consistency in arc is better than flat shots. (Variation 4)

non_preferred_output.content: Do your best to shoot accurately.

messages.content: You are a professional AI basketball shooting coach.

preferred_output.content: Keep feet shoulder-width and square to basket. (Variation 5)

non_preferred_output.content: Remember to follow through.

messages.content: You are a professional AI basketball shooting coach.
Give me one piece of expert advice on shooting technique.

preferred_output.content: Start ball at belly-button level, not waist or chest. (Variation 1)

non_preferred_output.content: Stay calm and take your time.

preferred_output.content: Don’t rush—shoot smooth and deliberate. (Variation 1)
